channel.title: How do i make a new shop?
channel.description:
Don't say i haven't looked around... because i have. I've checked moparscape forums+Google but neither seem to have any tutorial on this.
Please give me a link to one if i happened to miss it... Or try to explain how step by step for me.
Thanks if you can help! It's greatly appreciated! :)

item.title: How do i make a new shop?
item.dc:creator: @Sexii_Jadii Sexii Jadii
item.description:
@Sexii_Jadii wrote:

There is a tutorial on this you are just being lazy…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new shop?

item.title: How do i make a new shop?
item.dc:creator: @Razik-Blaze Razik-Blaze
item.description:
@Razik-Blaze wrote:

[quote=“omgpish, post:2, topic:297359”]Go to autospawn.cfg

Add your desired NPC to the coords and add a description whatever you want

Add a new wanneShop in client class

Add it into shop.cfg

BAM have fun, if you fail to follow that then leave.[/quote]
This was posted before…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new shop?
